41 semaines,</i>
<i>14 heures et 3 minutes
et était épuisé...</i>

<i>At this very moment
at the Longborough school for boys,</i>
<i>young Ned had convinced
Eugene Mulchandani to go to war.</i>
<i>For not only was it proof
of his undying patriotism,</i>
<i>it was also a much-needed escape</i>
<i>from an advanced geometry lesson
in proofs of the Pythagorean kind.</i>
<i>However, like all hill-advised
troop deployments,</i>
<i>it did not come without its share
of unexpected casualties.</i>
<i>As they approached
their first combat fatality,</i>
<i>Eugene's emotional radar
was overcome,</i>
<i>forcing a hasty retreat.</i>
<i>Young Ned, on the other hand,
stood his ground.</i>
<i>He rationalized that,
if he solved the hunter's murder,</i>
<i>the acclaim would bring
his father back into his life.</i>
<i>But the hunter revealed
his cause of death was accidental</i>
<i>and self-inflicted.</i>
<i>There was no murderer to be caught.</i>
<i>Though the park ranger
would believe otherwise.</i>
<i>Waking the dead had landed
young Ned in jail.</i>
<i>Both boys were perceived,</i>
<i>by Papen County juvenile
correction officers,</i>
<i>as anything but heroes.</i>
<i>And while his comrade secured
an honorable discharge,</i>
<i>through the strength
of his parental allies,</i>

"<i>Kerplunk</i>"

--==All-about-Subs.fr==--
<i>At this very moment
in the town of Coeur d'Louise,</i>
<i>young Lily Charles was 5 years,
16 hours and 2 minutes old.</i>
<i>Three days earlier, her sister Vivian
was born with a hole in her heart.</i>
<i>Cardiologists patched the flaw
and Lily received her orders,</i>
<i>put her vulnerable sibling
before herself.</i>
<i>On her 11th birthday, land-loving Lily
was given a backyard pool</i>
<i>and a swimming suit
that matched her sister Vivian's.</i>
<i>Lily would soon realize that constant
exposure to her younger sister</i>
<i>made Vivian a devoted mimic.</i>
<i>From matching swimsuits
and backyard poolery,</i>
<i>The </i>Darling Mermaid Darlings
<i>were born.</i>
<i>The renowned synchronized swimming
sisters were loyal beyond separation</i>
<i>until Charles Charles.</i>
<i>Engaged to sister Vivian,
but in love with sister Lily,</i>
<i>Charles Charles not only planted
